definition[0]: to decide that something is not possible or suitable
example[0]: The police have ruled out suicide.
example[1]: She has refused to rule out the possibility of singing again.
definition[1]: to make it impossible for something to happen
example[2]: The mountainous terrain rules out most forms of agriculture.
definition[2]: to state that someone will not be able to take part in a sports event
example[3]: He has been ruled out of the match with a knee injury.
example[4]: Management has not ruled out further redundancies.
